LanguageData.BULDRESTStool.label: BULDREST凳(BULDREST Stool)
LanguageData.BULDRESTStool.description: BULDREST凳 有人认为堆叠stonechunks是 更好地为坐在总比什么都没有。 他们是对的。(BULDREST Stool Someone thought that stacked stonechunks are better for sitting on than nothing. They were right.)
LanguageData.BULDRESTStool_Blueprint.label: 大便BULDREST（蓝图）(BULDREST Stool (blueprint))
LanguageData.BULDRESTStool_Blueprint_Install.label: 大便BULDREST（蓝图）(BULDREST Stool (blueprint))
LanguageData.BULDRESTStool_Frame.label: 大便BULDREST（建筑）(BULDREST Stool (building))
LanguageData.BULDRESTStool_Frame.description: BULDREST凳 有人认为堆叠stonechunks是 更好地为坐在总比什么都没有。 他们是对的。(BULDREST Stool Someone thought that stacked stonechunks are better for sitting on than nothing. They were right.)
LanguageData.WODENTable.label: 木桌子(WODEN Table)
LanguageData.WODENTable.description: 木桌子 这是一张桌子。它是用木头做的。 这是老摇摇晃晃的，而不是什么好看的， 但它会保持你的食物掉在地上。大概。(WODEN Table It's a table. It's made of wood. It's old and rickety and not much to look at, but it will hold your food off the floor. Probably.)
LanguageData.WODENTable_Blueprint.label: 木桌（蓝图）(WODEN Table (blueprint))
LanguageData.WODENTable_Blueprint_Install.label: 木桌（蓝图）(WODEN Table (blueprint))
LanguageData.WODENTable_Frame.label: 木桌（建筑）(WODEN Table (building))
LanguageData.WODENTable_Frame.description: 木桌子 这是一张桌子。它是用木头做的。 这是老摇摇晃晃的，而不是什么好看的， 但它会保持你的食物掉在地上。大概。(WODEN Table It's a table. It's made of wood. It's old and rickety and not much to look at, but it will hold your food off the floor. Probably.)
LanguageData.PILFURBed.label: PILFUR床(PILFUR bed)
LanguageData.PILFURBed.description: PILFUR床 为什么睡时，你可以睡地板 上的东西，一个舒适的一堆(PILFUR bed Why sleep on the floor when you can sleep on a comfy pile of stuff)
LanguageData.PILFURBed_Blueprint.label: PILFUR床（蓝图）(PILFUR bed (blueprint))
LanguageData.PILFURBed_Blueprint_Install.label: PILFUR床（蓝图）(PILFUR bed (blueprint))
LanguageData.PILFURBed_Frame.label: PILFUR床（建筑）(PILFUR bed (building))
LanguageData.PILFURBed_Frame.description: PILFUR床 为什么睡时，你可以睡地板 上的东西，一个舒适的一堆(PILFUR bed Why sleep on the floor when you can sleep on a comfy pile of stuff)
LanguageData.KAGESHAINLamp.label: KAGESHAIN灯(KAGESHAIN Lamp)
LanguageData.KAGESHAINLamp.description: KAGESHAIN灯 再也没有出现过许多KAGESHAIN灯所产生。 它有一个小的设计缺陷，其中防止笼 灯泡被替换。其实人们关心这一点。(KAGESHAIN Lamp There have not been many KAGESHAIN lamps produced. It had a small design flaw where the cage prevented the bulb to be replaced. People actually cared about that.)
LanguageData.KAGESHAINLamp_Blueprint.label: KAGESHAIN灯（蓝图）(KAGESHAIN Lamp (blueprint))
LanguageData.KAGESHAINLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: KAGESHAIN灯（蓝图）(KAGESHAIN Lamp (blueprint))

It had a small design flaw where the cage prevented the bulb to be replaced. People actually cared about that.)

LanguageData.LAMPONLamp.label: LAMPON灯(LAMPON Lamp)
LanguageData.LAMPONLamp.description: LAMPON灯 灯吊在织物上。不是很亮，但肯定相当。(LAMPON Lamp Lights strung on fabric. Not very bright but sure pretty.)

LanguageData.FEERSTELL.label: FEERSTELL壁炉(FEERSTELL fireplace)
LanguageData.FEERSTELL.description: FEERSTELL壁炉 可建的，而不是一堵墙，但效果最好用密封cimney背后 该路线从背面背面的热量通过通风口(FEERSTELL fireplace Can be built instead of a wall, but works best with a sealed cimney behind that routes the heat from the backside back through a vent)
LanguageData.FEERSTELL_Blueprint.label: FEERSTELL壁炉（蓝图）(FEERSTELL fireplace (blueprint))
LanguageData.FEERSTELL_Blueprint_Install.label: FEERSTELL壁炉（蓝图）(FEERSTELL fireplace (blueprint))
LanguageData.FEERSTELL_Frame.label: FEERSTELL壁炉（建筑）(FEERSTELL fireplace (building))
LanguageData.FEERSTELL_Frame.description: FEERSTELL壁炉 可建的，而不是一堵墙，但效果最好用密封cimney背后 该路线从背面背面的热量通过通风口(FEERSTELL fireplace Can be built instead of a wall, but works best with a sealed cimney behind that routes the heat from the backside back through a vent)
